content: Hoho~ Just as I thought! When I saw the mist clear and the tide go out, I knew you must have found something amazing, so...

content:
Welcome back!
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>Sani</color>, great job.
Ah! <color=#8AAB4B>Mors</color>, welcome!

content: Mr. Mobai! I found a great spot here!

content:
That's another way to show how special it is!
It's almost as if the ecosystem is healing itself.
info: 回到营地（月下小聚）-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
I've prepared some tea on the beach to welcome you all.
Let's have some tea, enjoy the sea breeze, and spend some time together.
You can tell me all about your new discoveries.

content: Although I'm a new face here, based on my experience in titling research papers, I believe the Astralink name should also follow the ecological naming conventions.

content: Its value cannot be measured by size alone. It's immune to the maelstrom and allows multiple ecosystems to co-exist — These are conditions that even artificial labs can't recreate.

content: I see, so this was actually a blessing in disguise. Thank you so much — you've discovered a very special "Little Bubble World" for our Astralink, hoho!

content: Thank you so much! However, let's take it one step at a time! The fog just scattered, and there's much to be done.

content: But... what's the name of our Astralink?

content: Yes! Next!

content: Many Astralinks have multiple Bubble Worlds. I didn't expect us to find such a mysterious and unique existence so quickly. This is a very pleasant surprise!

content: Wow! Now that's a mighty pen!

content: So, why don't we take this opportunity to name it properly today? A name defines existence, so please think carefully over your suggestions, hoho.
